title: SET_WIND
content:
0xAC3A74E8384A99190xC6294698// SetWind
void SET_WIND(float speed);Parameters:speed: The wind speed (clamped to between 0.0 and 1.0)Sets the the raw wind speed value. The wind speed will stay persistent until it is reset (see examples).Examples:LuaJavaScriptC#-- Stops all and any wind
SetWind(0)

-- Sets the wind to 6 m/s
SetWind(0.5)

-- Allows the game dynamically change the wind again
SetWind(-1)
codeBlocks:
-- Stops all and any wind
SetWind(0)

-- Sets the wind to 6 m/s
SetWind(0.5)

-- Allows the game dynamically change the wind again
SetWind(-1)
